T02TD3659E:264b-1: bhr'i ku ti s'a dha nam /
T02TD3659E:264b-3: khro gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD3659E:264b-4: bcom ldan 'das yum khro gnyer can ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3659E:264b-5: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga las sa bon lnga pa'i gsum pa la /
T02TD3659E:264b-6: dang po'i brgyad pas rdzogs par byas pa stong pas mnan par bsams la /
T02TD3659E:264b-7: de nyid las byung ba'i lha mo khor gnyer can ma /
T02TD3659E:264b-8: ral ba dang thor tshugs 'chang ba /
T02TD3659E:264b-10: phyag bzhi pa phyag g-yas na mchog sbyin dang bgrang phreng /
T02TD3659E:264b-11: g-yon na dbyig pa dang spyi blugs bsnams pa /
T02TD3659E:264b-12: padma'i gdan la bzhugs par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3659E:264b-13: de nas lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo brkyang ba spyar la /
T02TD3659E:265a-0: @265a * // mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan te /
T02TD3659E:265a-1: so sor phye la lhag ma rnams rdo rjer bya ba 'di ni lha mo khro gnyer can ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD3659E:265a-2: sngags la aom bhr'im sv'a h'a /
T02TD3659E:265a-3: khro gnyer can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
